analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#564-577):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#575-576)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#577)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#399-481):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#410-417)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#421-425)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#460-461)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#457-459)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#492-508):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#494-497)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#767-793) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#786-793)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_contracts/0x9875fe006d796a1a7533596ebf778b575ac01ed0.sol#779-793)
